attributes.action: scrap the legislation banning broadcasters from discussing and endorsing candidates during elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the Prime Minister to scrap the OFCOM rules which stop broadcasters (radio talk show hosts, presenters) from airing political views in the run up to local or national elections.

The whole point of a free media is to scrutinize candidates and ensure that the best people are elected.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
